Condor:

Condor's maximal program continued the fight against the process, and 
now every one could notice his facial movementes, he was breathing 
heavily.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> 
> 	Switchblade notices the small facial movements on Condor's 
> face as his original program fights the reprograming. He growls... 
> <<Another interference...>> He transforms into cassette mode, 
> and plugs himself into the machine, and begins to help the process.
> 
> 
> On 22 Apr 2001, at 23:52, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Condor:
> > 
> > Condor didn't wake up. He was in stasis lock while Switchblade 
drags him towards the lab. When reprogramation process started his 
maximal program started to fight to avoid it.
